metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4455 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in sproctor php-calendar. This affects an unknown part of the file index.php. The manipulation of the argument $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The name of the patch is a2941109b42201c19733127ced763e270a357809. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-215445 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: php-calendar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
